short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and manage links to tools with descriptions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly organize, save, and access your favorite tools and websites with our Bookmark Manager Extension. Designed for simplicity and efficiency, this extension enhances your browsing experience by providing quick access to your most-used links.

---Key Features:

---New Bookmark Creation:

Easily add new bookmarks with a simple form.
Input the name, link, and a brief description for each bookmark.
Category Management:

Select or create categories to organize your bookmarks.
Quickly navigate between categories to find your saved tools.
Export Functionality:

Export your saved bookmarks for backup or sharing.
Available directly from the 'Saved Tools' tab for convenience.
User-Friendly Interface:

---Intuitive Design:

Clean and modern interface ensures a smooth user experience.
Accessible tabs for adding new bookmarks and viewing saved tools.
Quick Access:

Easily switch between the 'New Bookmark' and 'Saved Tools' tabs.
Immediate access to the export feature when viewing saved tools.
How to Use:

---Add a New Bookmark:

Open the extension and click on the 'New Bookmark' tab.
Fill out the form with the tool's category, name, link, and description.
Click 'Save Tool' to add the bookmark.
View and Manage Saved Tools:

Click on the 'Saved Tools' tab to view your categorized bookmarks.
Export your list by clicking the export icon when in the 'Saved Tools' tab.
Requirements:

Compatible with the latest versions of major browsers.
Support:

For any issues or suggestions, please contact us at ualtaf241@gmail.com

Enhance your productivity and keep your favorite tools at your fingertips with the Bookmark Manager Extension. Download now and start organizing your online resources with ease!
